title: ErrorCode (Enum)
text:
TYPE ErrorCode :
The
STATUS
output has the data type DWORD which is interpreted as a packed array of four bytes.
Byte 0:
Function_Num
Byte 1:
Error_Decode
Byte 2:
Error_Code_1
Byte 3:
Error_Code_2
The Elements are used as specified in IEC 61158-6 (Profibus DP, Profinet IO)
Exception: If
Function_Num
has a value of 16#40, no protocol element is used.
This is the case for example if the validation of one input parameter failed.
In this case
Error_Decode
value of 16#82..16#8F reports an error at parameter number 2 - 15.
Other fixed error codes are defined in this enum.
Attributes:
qualified_only

rows.Name: RDIAG_PROFINET
rows.Comment: tried to use RDIAG on Profinet device

rows.Name: NO_RESSOURCE
rows.Comment: Out of ressources or ressource busy.

rows.Name: BUFFER_SIZE
rows.Comment: specified local data-buffer size too small

rows.Name: INVALID_STATE
rows.Comment: requested operation not possible in this state

rows.Name: ADDRESS_INVALID
rows.Comment: address is invalid or unreachable (e.g. different IP subnet)

rows.Name: DEVICETYPE_MISMATCH
rows.Comment: target device has wrong type for requested operation
